Talk_01:
The bracing winds of change are here in
Hateno Village! Presenting an exclusive
new fashion concept: the Cece brand!<sp:0:4:0>Catering to fashion-forward individuals,
this mushroom-motif style is taking the
village by storm. Don't get left out!
Talk_18:
Come to the pasture for your very own
thick, round Hateno cheese! First come,
first served! -Koyin
Talk_02:
Hateno's Mayoral Election Is On!<sp:0:4:0>Reede, the incumbent mayor of
Hateno Village, is running against
Cece, darling of the fashion world.<sp:0:4:0>To settle whose vision for Hateno will
win out, the two of them have agreed
to hold an election. Details soon!
Talk_19:
Announcing Link, Our New Professor!<sp:0:4:0>Please give a warm welcome to the
newest member of our faculty at the
local school! -Symin
Talk_03:
Cece or Reede: A Voter's Guide!<sp:0:4:0>Cece plans to further the village's cultural
development through fashion.<sp:0:4:0>Reede, meanwhile, seeks to encourage
agricultural development with new
vegetables for Hateno's farmers.<sp:0:4:0>We'll keep you posted on any future
developments with the two candidates!
Talk_04:
Has Cece pulled ahead of Reede in the
Hateno Village mayoral election due to
her successful courting of the youth vote?<sp:0:4:0>Cece's platform emphasizes cultural
development via fashion, while Reede has
bet it all on agricultural development.<sp:0:4:0>Cece's brand is especially popular with
the younger folk in town, which may have
given her a slight advantage.
Talk_05:
Election Update: Cece or Reede?<sp:0:4:0>Cece's platform emphasizes cultural
development via fashion, while Reede has
bet it all on agricultural development.<sp:0:4:0>Preparations for the election are moving
along, it seems, but where do the
candidates actually stand?<sp:0:4:0>It's still anybody's race at this point!
Talk_06:
The Hateno Village Results Are In!<sp:0:4:0>Due to Cece withdrawing her candidacy,
the election ended with Reede, the
current mayor, retaining his position.<sp:0:4:0>Reede and Cece announced that they are
putting their differences aside to support
the growth of Hateno Village.<sp:0:4:0>The winds of change may yet sweep
through Hateno Village! Keep reading
for future developments!
Talk_13:
If you need something, find me at
Lookout Landing in front of Hyrule Castle.
             -Robbie, Purah Pad Lab Manager
Talk_20:
Visit the Purah Pad Laboratory on the
hill for machine upgrades, repairs and
extensions!
Talk_14:
Help wantedâ€”apply to become a teacher.
Want to show children the joy of learning?
No experience necessary!<sp:0:4:0>Inquire at the school for more information.
Prospective applicants are welcome to sit
in on a lesson. -Symin
Talk_15:
Help! Bodyguard wanted!<sp:0:4:0>If you think you have what it takes, come
to the field at the village entrance!
                                         -Mayor Reede
Talk_21:
Ten outfits, ten colors! Dye it your way!
                                     -Kochi Dye Shop
Talk_22:
Looking to shake up your style? Bring any
cloth you have to us, and a shop assistant
will be happy to help!<sp:0:4:0>We also welcome input for designs!
                                     -Kochi Dye Shop
Talk_16:
Every day is different. Your clothes should
follow suit.
                                     -Kochi Dye Shop
Talk_17:
I've made a breakthrough! Compendium
completists, come check it out!
             -Robbie, Purah Pad Lab Manager
Talk_23:
Dream of owning your own home?
Come down to Tarrey Town in Akkala!<sp:0:4:0>We'll build it for you just the way you saw
it in your dreams!
                              -Hudson Construction
